name: Lehto
description:
This forest is quiet and empty... But you can change that! Build homes using your tools that animals will be interested in. By creating different types of houses that appeal to different animals, you can increase the variety of plant and animal life, or biodiversity, in the forest.

Created for the Eko Game Jam event. https://www.ekogamejam.org/

Credits.

Samuli Jääskeläinen- Code & Unity

Sini Haapanen- Artist & UI Design
